basics.label: Co-Manager
basics.summary: Seeking a management position that utilizes my strong experience and skills to achieve an organization's sales and profit goals Well-organized, detail-oriented individual who manages a high volume workload within a deadline driven environment. Skilled in use of MS Word, MS Excel, MS Power Point; bilingual in French and Creole

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: 120 Employees -$800,000 Weekly Sales Volume. Hire, train, supervise and terminate hourly associates; develop plans to assist in achievement of maximum performance; monitor and give constructive feedback in a timely manner.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: 300 Employees -$1,500,000 .00 Weekly Sales Volume. Managed direct reports, delegated and monitored against a pre-determined deadline and measure of quality.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: 20 Employees $100,000 Weekly Sales Volume. Consulted with customers to recommend and sell variety of AT&T products and services to meet customers' needs.

work.name: Company Name
work.position: Team Leader / Service Delivery Coordinator / Supervisor
work.summary: 108 Employees -$325,000 Weekly Sales Volume. Provided guidance and direction to all Member Service Counselors, real-time management of the call center floor.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Performed light typing and clerical duties and heavy volume of phone calls. Assisted customers with their renewal application process.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Supervised inventory, verified quantity and quality of products received. Interfaced directly with customers to provide assistance and resolve problems.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: 23 Employees. Supervised all daily functions of store activity to ensure customer satisfaction. Interacted with customers on a daily basis; transferred monetary transactions for the business

work.name: Company Name
